name: Prep-pred pattern
motivation:
When you have different code-base, library or resource load requirements for preprocess and prediction.
When you want to separate preprocess with prediction to divide issue in each resource to improve availability
solution: divide preprocessing steps and the prediction model into separate resources
consequences:
Pros: (1) Able to use resource efficiently with fault isolation.
(2) Flexibility in resource usage and scalability.
(3) Able to select library and language versions for each component.
Cons: (1) Increases operation cost with complexity in resources.
(2) Network connection in between preprocess and prediction may become bottleneck.
